articles.title: ESA's ‘six luminous spots of light’ post intrigues people. Seen share yet? - Hindustan Times
articles.description: European Space Agency (ESA)  took to Instagram to share the post. | Trending
articles.content: The official Instagram page of European Space Agency (ESA) is a treasure trove for those who love seeing content related to the world outside the Blue Planet. The profile is filled with various kinds… [+1186 chars]
